name: Walker Sighting (V)
Lore: '''Echo station, 3TA. We have spotted Imperial walkers.'' A Rebel tactic is to put as much ground as possible between walkers and Rebel troops, allowing time to prepare a defense.',
Text: 'While an AT-AT or AT-ST on table, destiny +3. Take Concussion Grenade, Logistical Delay, or Panic into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Sense.) OR If opponent''s AT-AT or AT-ST on table, peek at the top card of their Reserve Deck; may use 2 Force to make it lost.',
